title: Flickering ingame
body: I recently got windows on my laptop (windows 10) and now everytime I play a game there's flickering while I'm in game. I was wondering if anyone had the same issue or was able to fix this problem. Any help would be great!

replies.body: This might be related to some out of date graphics drivers possibly. Double check for any missed updates, and make sure to go through the rest of the steps in this [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) just in case the main issue lies elsewhere in those steps.
